mapper.sql: D_011.ID, D_011.MAINID, D_011.DPRTCODE, D_011.YSWJM, D_011.WBWJM, D_011.NBWJM, D_011.WJDX, D_011.HZM, D_011.SM, D_011.CFLJ, D_011.YXZT, D_011.CZSJ, D_011.CZBMID, D_011.CZRID
mapper.select: select ,czr_user.realname czr_realname,czr_user.username czr_username from D_011 left join t_user czr_user on(D_011.czrid=czr_user.id) where MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yxzt=1
mapper.insert: insert into D_011 (ID, MAINID, DPRTCODE, YSWJM, WBWJM, NBWJM, WJDX, HZM, SM, CFLJ, YXZT, CZSJ, CZBMID, CZRID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yswjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wbwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nbwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjdx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hzm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cflj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{czbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
